meanings: (재산·세력 등을 커지게 하다) increase, (세력 등을) extend

meanings.meaning: cited to the field of battle
scattered wrecks on a stormbeaten shore

vlive.english: Remember the rice cakes we soaked in water earlier?
What if we get called in again?

vlive.korean: [내 이름은 김싱가포르로 개명해서 네 저요? 하면서 불려나가버려] 싱가포르!
vlive.english: [then I'm going to have to change my name to Singapore] Singapore!

vlive.korean: [STEP 7 월남쌈용 라이스페이퍼를 따뜻한 물에 10초가량 짧게 불려줍니다] 이렇게... 뜨거워!
vlive.english: [Step 7. Soak rice paper in warm water for 10 seconds] Like this... It's hot!
No one calls me Mandeugi. - Jendeuk Ramsey?

examples.english: It has been called modern-day slavery.
I got called on the carpet for being late.

examples.korean: 그 싸움을 중단시키기 위해 경찰이 불려 왔다.
examples.english: Police were called in to break up the fight.

examples.korean: 집안싸움을 해결하기 위해 경찰이 불려 왔다.
examples.english: The police were called to sort out a domestic.

examples.korean: 벨기에 출신 배우인 장 클로드 반담은 ‘브뤼셀에서 온 근육질’이라는 별명으로 불려 왔다.
examples.english: The Belgian actor Jean Claude Van Damme has been dubbed ‘Muscles from Brussels’.
